scenario_text.value:
(Lopmon is following Shuuji around a few
steps back, like a frightened child.)

I know you said you’re all different, but I’m
surprised some of you are like Lopmon.
Timid, frightened, and cowardly, I mean.

Oh yeah, lots of us are really scared all the
time.

But the ones who are like that tend to stick
together and look out for each other.

That makes sense, but...that’s not what
Lopmon is doing.

Right. But if he could just get along with
Shuuji, I think he’d be okay.

What’s wrong, Takuma? Aren’t you going to
talk with Shuuji?
